EmailTemplate.subject: Instant, simple, & convenient cash payments for your customers
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, No one likes to wait, especially when they’re getting paid. Give consumers what they want — instant payment, no waiting or hassle — with NCR Pay360 <[[https://www.ncr.com/payments/pay360?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2023_March_Pay360_Payments&utm_content=Email2&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=]]>. So, what is NCR Pay360? Simply put, it’s the fastest way to pay consumers, giving them instant access to cash at 25,000 ATMs and counting. It’s simple, convenient, and fast! Here’s how it works… - You or your customer initiates a payment - An NCR Pay360 cash code is delivered in seconds through the media of your choice — app, text, email, etc. - Your customer enters the code at a participating ATM to instantly receive or deposit cash – no cards needed; no new accounts; they don’t even need a bank! One simple code allows for instant cash-in and cash-out transactions at thousands of participating ATMs. With NCR Pay360, you can give your customers a choice and make it easy and fast for them to get paid or deposit cash, earning you a competitive advantage and loads of good will. Adding cash payments is easy with our API and proven ATM platform. Contact us today to learn more about NCR Pay360! <[[https://www.ncr.com/payments/pay360?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2023_March_Pay360_Payments&utm_content=Email2&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=]]> Kind regards, NCR Payments Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
